title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Build and optimize user interfaces for millions of users worldwide. Work with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Mentor available from senior engineers at Google. Opportunity to work on real products used by billions.

title: Data Science & ML Intern
description: Work on cutting-edge machine learning models and data pipelines. Use Python, TensorFlow, and cloud technologies. Real-world projects with guidance from data science leaders. Opportunity to work on Azure AI services.

title: UI/UX Designer Intern
description: Design beautiful interfaces and create world-class user experiences. Work with product teams and learn design systems from industry leaders. Tools: Figma, Protopie, and user testing frameworks.

title: Backend Engineer Intern
description: Build scalable backend systems handling millions of requests daily. Learn AWS, microservices architecture, and distributed systems. Work on real Amazon products. Mentorship from senior AWS engineers.

title: Mobile App Development Intern
description: Develop mobile applications used by billions of people. Work with React Native, Swift, or Kotlin. Learn from world-class engineers at Meta. Build real features for Meta's platforms.

title: DevOps & Cloud Engineer Intern
description: Work with cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization. Learn Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS or Azure. Real deployment experience on IBM Cloud services. Hands-on learning from DevOps experts.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Build complete web applications from frontend to backend. Learn modern tech stack and agile development practices. Work on real client projects. Guidance from experienced full-stack developers.

title: AI/ML Research Intern
description: Work on cutting-edge AI research and model development. Publish papers and contribute to open-source projects. Top-tier mentorship from OpenAI researchers. Opportunity to shape the future of AI.

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Learn cybersecurity practices, ethical hacking, and security audits. Hands-on experience with real security challenges. Work with Deloitte's security team on actual client projects.

title: Product Manager Intern
description: Work on product strategy, user research, and feature development. Learn from experienced PMs. Influence real product decisions at Stripe. Mentorship in product thinking and execution.

title: Blockchain Developer Intern
description: Build blockchain applications and smart contracts. Learn Solidity, Web3.js, and DeFi protocols. Shape the future of crypto at Coinbase. Work on real blockchain products.

title: Content & Marketing Intern
description: Create engaging content and optimize for search. Learn content marketing, SEO best practices, and analytics tools. Work with HubSpot's content team. Build portfolio with real content projects.

title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Advanced cybersecurity training with real penetration testing. Learn from Norton security experts. Work on actual security assessments. Opportunity to pursue security certifications.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Build software that reaches billions of Apple users worldwide. Work with Swift, Objective-C, or modern web technologies. Learn from Apple's world-class engineering team. Opportunity to work on iconic products.

title: Graphics & Game Developer
description: Develop games and 3D graphics using Unity engine. Learn game development best practices. Work on real game projects. Mentorship from experienced game developers at Unity.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Intern
description: Work on cloud infrastructure and developer tools. Learn containerization, infrastructure as code, and cloud deployment. Build tools used by millions of developers. Mentorship from infrastructure experts.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Ensure software quality through comprehensive testing. Learn automation testing and QA best practices. Work on real SaaS products. Mentorship in quality assurance from seasoned QA engineers.

title: Database Administrator Intern
description: Manage enterprise databases and optimize performance. Learn SQL, database administration, and backup strategies. Work on critical database systems. Training from Oracle DBA experts.

title: Business Intelligence Intern
description: Create powerful data visualizations and dashboards. Learn Tableau, data analytics, and business intelligence. Build real BI solutions for clients. Mentorship from Tableau experts.

title: Network Engineer Intern
description: Work with network infrastructure and telecommunications. Learn networking fundamentals and Cisco technologies. Configure and manage enterprise networks. Hands-on training from Cisco engineers.

title: Platform Engineering Intern
description: Build platform engineering tools and infrastructure. Learn Terraform, Vault, and automation. Contribute to open-source projects. Mentorship from HashiCorp engineers.

title: Frontend Engineer Intern
description: Build user experiences for millions of travelers worldwide. Work with React, JavaScript, and modern frontend tools. Learn design systems and user-focused development. Mentorship from Airbnb designers.

title: Data Engineer Intern
description: Work with big data and distributed computing systems. Learn Apache Spark and data pipeline development. Build scalable data solutions. Mentorship from Databricks data engineers.

title: Security Engineer Intern
description: Build secure authentication and authorization systems. Learn OAuth2, SAML, and modern security protocols. Work on real identity management solutions. Training from Auth0 security experts.

title: Technical Writer Intern
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation and guides. Learn technical writing best practices. Work on GitLab's documentation and blogs. Mentorship from senior technical writers.
